comments.raw_text: When you click the "forgotten password" link and then confirm the password change with the URL given in the email, you should be logged in immediately once you have entered your new password. Else this means you have to type your password a 3rd time to log in, which is a minor annoyance.

comments.raw_text: I prefer having to log in, just to doublecheck that logging in works as expected.  On sites that don't require me to log in, I usually log out and back in just to check.  I've seen too many sites that let you set your password to something that it won't let you log in with (usually by exceeding a maximum length; see also Bug #999958).
